item.title: China counters Trump's accusations of Geneva trade deal violations, says U.S. undermining consensus
item.description: Tensions between U.S. and China have flared up after a hiatus following a meeting between Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and his Chinese counterpart...

item.title: Trump-backed nationalist clinches Poland's presidency
item.description: Eurosceptic Nawrocki's win can deliver considerable setbacks to former European Council President Tusk's pro-EU government.

item.title: Elon Musk says he doesn't 'want to take responsibility for everything the administrationâ€™s doing'
item.description: "I was disappointed to see the massive spending bill," Elon Musk said on CBS's "Sunday Morning."

item.title: Trump lauds Elon Musk and DOGE at White House farewell
item.description: Musk, the Tesla and SpaceX CEO, worked for Trump's DOGE effort after spending over $250 million helping to get him elected.

item.title: Trump advisers defend tariffs amid legal fight, insisting they're 'not going away'
item.description: The looming legal fight injects uncertainty into President Donald Trump's evolving tariffs plan, which has upended the global economy since April 2.
